entry.title: Offensive Security OSCE Resources
entry.content:
This is a place for me to keep OSCE resources. I'll update as I see fit.


CTP Syllabus
https://www.offensive-security.com/documentation/cracking-the-perimeter-syllabus.pdf


CTP Registration Challenge
http://www.fc4.me/


Exploit Tutorials
These are the exploit tutorials I have been through, and the order in which I recommend going through them.
The Grey Corner - Intro to Fuzzing using Spike and Vulnserver
The Grey Corner - Fuzzer Authomation with Spike and Vulnserver
The Grey Corner - Debugging Fundamentals for Exploit Development Part I
The Grey Corner - Debugging Fundamentals for Exploit Development Part II
The Grey Corner - Stack-based Buffer Overflow Part I
The Grey Corner - Stack-based Buffer Overflow Part II
The Grey Corner - Stack-based Buffer Overflow Part III
Fuzzy Security - Intro to Exploit Development
Fuzzy Security - Saved Return Pointer Overflows
Corelan - Stack-based Overflows
Corelan - Stack-based Overflows - jumping to shellcode
Fuzzy Security - Structured Exception Handler
Corelan - SEH Based Exploits
Corelan - SEH Based Exploit - another example

These are the larger collections of tutorials from each of the entities providing the tutorials referenced within this section.
Additional Tutorials from The Grey Corner
Additional Tutorials from Fuzzy Security
Additional Tutorials from Corelan


Exploitable Apps
http://www.oldapps.com/
http://www.oldversion.com/
https://github.com/stephenbradshaw/vulnserver


Registers
https://www.swansontec.com/sregisters.html
https://wiki.skullsecurity.org/Registers


CTP/OSCE Reviews and Guides
https://www.securitysift.com/offsec-ctp-osce/
https://blog.g0tmi1k.com/2013/08/cracking-perimeter-ctp-offensive/
https://www.nearsecurity.com/2018/11/my-journey-into-offsec-abyss-oscp-and.html
https://www.abatchy.com/2017/03/osce-study-plan
https://rootkits.xyz/blog/2017/02/osce-ctp-offensive-security/
http://lmgtfy.com/?q=offsec+osce+exam+guide
